title: Pathophysiological Features in Electronic Medical Records Sustain Model Performance under Temporal Dataset Shift
details: R Brosula, CK Corbin, JH Chen - AMIA Summits on Translational Science …, 2024
abstract: Access to real-world data streams like electronic medical records (EMRs) has accelerated the development of supervised machine learning (ML) models for clinical applications. However, few studies investigate the differential impact of …
